decimal_places.tooltip: Decimal places of download and upload speed shown in the panel

gui_text_css.tooltip: A CSS style applied to the text in the panel

gui_received_icon_filename.tooltip: An icon displayed next to download speed in the panel

gui_sent_icon_filename.tooltip: An icon displayed next to upload speed in the panel

show_hover.tooltip: Show the hover popup with total bytes downloaded and uploaded

hover_popup_text_css.tooltip: A CSS style applied to the description text in the hover popup

hover_popup_numbers_css.tooltip: A CSS style applied to numbers in the hover popup

launch_terminal.description: List current Internet connections on left mouse click
launch_terminal.tooltip: Open a terminal with a list of current connections on a left mouse click. The next click closes the terminal.

list_connections_command.tooltip: A command used to list current Internet connections

data_limit.tooltip: The maxium amount of data to download and upload. 0 means no limits

gui_data_limit_type.tooltip: Show the percentage of data limit used in the panel

data_limit_command_enabled.description: Invoke command when data limit exceeded
data_limit_command_enabled.tooltip: Invoke a command when amount of data downloaded and uploaded exceeded the limit

data_limit_command.default: echo "Data limit exceeded. This terminal will close in 5 seconds."; sleep 5; exit 0;
